author: ThioJoe
description:
Can't believe I had to do this myself 🤨
⇒ Become a channel member for special emojis, early videos, and more! Check it out here: https://www.youtube.com/ThioJoe/join

But for real Logitech, please for the love of God still add it as a hardware feature in the firmware 😩

Download Page: https://github.com/ThioJoe/Dynamic-Lighting-Key-Indicator/releases
